Description: Sandal for the right foot, made of plaited reed and palm leaves and papyrus, toe and ankle straps missing, most of uppers remain, pointed and curled toe.
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405740001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Bibliographic references: Veldmeijer 2009b / Studies of ancient Egyptian footwear. Technological aspects. Part XII. Fibre shoes (99-100, 102, 113)
